nodes.caption: Bi-directional Mendelian Randomization Exploring the Relationship between Periodontitis and Type 2 Diabetes
Assumption 2 Genetic variants are independent of confounders
Assumption 1 Genetic variants are related with the exposure
Outcome of interest 1. Type 2 diabetes 2. Periodontitis
Assumption 3 Genetic variants affect the risk of outcome completely through the exposure, rather than alternative pathways
Sensitivity analysis MRPRESSO,MR Egger intercept test, Cochran’s Q, leave-one-out analysis
